items.content_html: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.
items.title: mrshappy0/mini-mealie: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.
